content: Can we assume that for part 3, when we need to do the time_before function, we will not be given a months value greater than 12? Or will we have to account for that as well?
subject: Pset 4 Part 3 - Time Frames Assumption

content:
There is no bound placed on the year or month variables. They can be any positive or negative integer, and your function will need to take that into account.

Think about each component separately: for example, 24 months prior to a given date is the same as 2 years prior to that date; 2 years and 24 months prior to a given date is the same as 4 years prior to that date, etc.
is there a bound placed on the days variable?
There is none, so don't worry about it :)
